programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Can a fox-red Labrador called Bear impress two would-be owners without putting his paw in it? And 88-year-old identical twins hope that pint-sized Alfie will join them at the pub.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours in...
programme.desc: Joe Lycett and Roisin Conaty visit the fairy-tale city of Salzburg, where they enjoy a three-course meal on horse and carriage tour, some forest-bathing, and a spot of musical cycling.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz make their way to East London to take on a 1964 Porsche 356, without a shred of a doubt, the worst car they have ever taken on. In spite of its almost terminal condition underneath all that rust and rot lies an automotive legend.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: On the Costa del Sol, Andrew and Shani Hamilton help Michael and Cierwen find a beachfront apartment, while the Rodriguez family hope to make a dream a reality on the Costa Brava.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In France, Paul and Yip are forced to scale new heights to save an important part of La Buslière. In Spain, Mike raises the roof at his abandoned settlement.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a couple who have re-mortgaged their house to build a sensational prototype apartment inspired by a bee hive. Theres also a barman who has bought a dilapidated Land Rover he plans to convert into a cocktail bar.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Debra and Greg look for a holiday home in the beautiful countryside of Murcia, which one day they hope to make their permanent home. Jasmine Harman shows them what their £150k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retirees Peter and Glynnis Tabberer have sold their home to buy a camper van, setting their sights on the next stage of their lives. They want to spend six months each year in their favourite corner of Florida, close to Sarasota on the Gulf Coast.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: First to host in Birmingham is canal-boat stewardess Denise Hendon. By her own admission, Denise is not the worlds greatest cook, but she hopes a night of Moroccan-themed revelry will do the job. However, her guests are underwhelmed by the menu. Party-girl Angela is dreading the couscous, while cheeky electrician Elliott thinks a salad starter is a cop out.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Birmingham, lady of leisure Daniella Lawler plans to wow her guests with a four course Italian-inspired menu. Shes also hoping that the Georgian country house which she shares with her husband, international DJ Steve Lawler, will prove the perfect setting for a winning dinner party. All goes well until Daniella realises her lobster is too big to fit in her pans.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Birmingham its the turn of office administrator Angela McFarlane, whos planning a fun-filled evening complete with a limbo competition. Over a starter of chicken and spring onion terrine with red onion marmalade, Elliot and Denise confront Angela about the strange things they found in the drawers in her bedroom, and its not long before Angelas behaviour returns to form with some saucy talk.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Birmingham, the penultimate host of the week is electrician Elliot Jauncey who, despite a lack of dinner party experience, is planning a top-class menu featuring not one, but two desserts. Elliot has even booked a local band to serenade his guests. However, Elliots evening proves to be far more difficult than he had hoped.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The last to host in Birmingham is devilishly good-looking French foodie Jean-Benoit Burloux, who plans a fabulous four-course menu including a salad of crab in a birds nest, a blade of beef, and a pavlova with raspberries. However, can Jean-Benoit find a way of overcoming Denises fussy eating habits and her tendency towards toilet talk?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Alison and Lee are moving to the countryside of Albox in Almería. They need a spacious property with a garden for their dogs. Ben Hillman sees if he can deliver everything they want for their £150k.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Tom and his son Alan look for a holiday home for Tom on beautiful Gran Canaria, that their whole family can enjoy. Can Ben Hillman find the perfect place for his budget of £120k?

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: When the Federation receives a distress signal from planet Vulcan during a hearing to decide whether Kirk has cheated on his final test at the academy, his friend Dr McCoy sneaks him aboard the USS Enterprise as it sets out on its maiden voyage.

programme.title: My Massive C**k
programme.desc: An extra-large penis is an object of desire for many. But for some men, extra-large seriously complicates their lives and relationships, and penis reduction surgery seems the only answer.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first to host from Bristol is all-singing, all-dancing, theatre darling Richard Hope-Hawkins, whose eclectic menu divides his guests before theyve even arrived. While, teacher Laura is impressed by the sound of Richards home-made pate,food-writer Daryl is intrigued by the Rod Steiger Gunge cake, and vegetarian Zoe is not looking forward to her alternative starter of red and green pepper mousse.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host in Bristol is super-organised primary school teacher Laura Ford, whos leaving nothing to chance with the planning for her dinner party, featuring a starter of prawn, chorizo and butternut squash salad, a Balinese curry, and a trio of lemon and raspberry based desserts.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Latest to host in Bristol is food critic Daryl Bullock. Darryls other great love is his animals, who make an unexpected appearance during proceedings. Its not long before the evening takes a nose dive when two of the guests stumble across a rather unpleasant surprise left by the cat and are left gagging. Can Darryls pork belly roast save the day, or will the evening end up a complete dogs dinner?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Botox fan Zoe Kellaway hopes to add a bit of sparkle to the competition in Bristol with her `Pretty in Pink themed dinner party. Zoe is cooking a predominantly pink menu, including beetroot risotto, and enlists the help of a butler to wear pink hot pants while serving cocktails on arrival. With exploding desserts and plenty of flesh on show, will Zoe succeed in cheering her guests up with her fun theme?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the last day of the competition in Bristol, and the turn of highly competitive Andy Wright. Andy is confident that his black-tie dinner party theme and palatial Victorian flat will bag him the cash. He has lined up a glamorous night of champagne, caviar, canapes and candlelight. However, chaos soon descends when Andy burns the nut roast and then loses his star ingredient for the dessert.

programme.title: Murder on the Victorian Railway
programme.desc: London 1864. On a Hackney bound train, a guard discovers blood in a first class carriage - and a body on the railway embankment. For the first time, a murder has taken place on Britains railways. Over a hundred years later, this documentary uses the first hand testimony of the people involved at the time to explore this unique event and how it provoked a huge public outcry and debate.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: The Engine That Powers the World
programme.desc: The surprising story of the hidden powerhouse behind the globalised world - the diesel engine, a 19th-century invention that has become indispensable to the 21st. Its a turtle versus hare tale in which the diesel engine races the petrol engine in a competition to replace ageing steam technology - a race eventually won hands down by diesel. Car enthusiast presenter Mark Evans gets excitedly hands on with some of the many applications of Mr Diesels original creation.

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: An ice pick used to stab a man in the head on the street is recovered from the roof of a pub and brings a murderer to justice. Investigators are baffled after a man is brutally killed on the street and all they have to go on is some grainy CCTV until a woman tells them she thinks her husband carried out the slaying as revenge for a drug deal that went wrong. Elsewhere, an anonymous letter throws suspicion on a man who police believe may not only be storing guns, but manufacturing his own.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martel is on home turf in Dundee, and she couldnt be any happier! Dion is looking around a vast house in Merseyside. In Plymouth, Tommy loves the period features on offer.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Day four of the World Athletics Championships continues with the semi-finals of the mens sprint hurdles. World record holder Grant Holloway has won the last three world golds but has been struggling for form this season.

programme.desc: A stunning Staffordshire build reaches its conclusion. Jacqui is in south east London, where an overgrown garden provides a challenge. In Greater Manchester, work has already started at a mid-terrace.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: The action on day five of the World Athletics Championships reaches its conclusion, and after springing a surprise to win gold in Budapest two years ago, Great Britains Josh Kerr is back to defend his 1500m title. It wont be easy with competition coming from a strong American contingent and Norways Jakob Ingebrigtsen, if he can prove his fitness.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps an aspiring writer who wants to make a dramatic relocation from the frenetic bustle of East London to the rural idylls of Dumfries and Galloway in Scotland. With a budget of £300,000, hes got his sights set on somewhere isolated that will inspire his creativity. Away from the houses, Alistair heads for the hills hoping to strike it lucky on a Scottish gold rush.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie uncovers valuable jewellery, and JJ restores scientific equipment. Money raised at auction will help a man, forced into early retirement, ignite a new passion in his garage.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Its semi-finals time, and the challenges include catering for members of the Jane Austen Society, not to mention a descendant of the famous author!

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Gabby Logan presents highlights from the opening match day of the 2025/26 Champions League. Six-time winners Liverpool take on Atletico Madrid at Anfield, and Chelsea return to the scene of their first European Cup triumph when they play Bayern Munich at the Allianz Arena. Tottenham open their campaign against Villarreal, and last seasons semi-finalists Arsenal travel to Bilbao to face Athletic Club. Holders PSG begin their title defence against Atalanta in Paris.

programme.title: The Aftermath
programme.desc: During the bitter winter of 1946, Rachael Morgan arrives in the ruins of Hamburg and is reunited with her husband Lewis, a British colonel overseeing the citys reconstruction. But Rachael is shocked to find that her new home, a grand old house, will be shared with its previous owners: a German widower and his daughter. With the war only just over, the atmosphere is charged with anger and grief that give way to passion and betrayal.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: Highlights from day 4 of the World Athletics Championships sees the mens high jump and hammer champions named. Grant Holloway is aiming to defend his sprint hurdles title, and Faith Kipyegon is the favourite in the womens 1,500m, after breaking her own world record over the distance in June. Sarah Mulkerrins presents all the action from Tokyo, including defending champion Josh Kerr in the semi-finals of the 1,500m and Matthew Hudson-Smith aiming to turn Olympic silver into world gold.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Famous monk St Augustine struggles to introduce Christianity to Saxon England and Stuart diarist Samuel Pepys annoys the smartest men in Britain. Later, we witness a daring escape from the Tower of London and Joan of Arcs story is quite an unusual one for a teenage girl.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy and Richard settle the thorny issue of which company has, above all others, made the greatest number of truly brilliant cars. James has a novel solution for getting caravans to campsites without clogging up the roads, and Jeremy hits the track in a remarkable replica of a legendary rally car. Plus, Radio 2s `Breakfast Show DJ-elect and all round petrolhead Chris Evans is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: On the evening of her 18th birthday, Molly Dawes finds herself drunk and is sick in the doorway of an army recruitment office. She looks into the window of the office and sees a life-sized photograph of an army girl, everything that Molly isnt but wants to be - respected. The following morning, Molly finds herself back in the locale and steels herself sufficiently to go into the recruitment office.

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Mollys first week as an army medic is heading for disaster until shes forced to prove just how brilliant she is.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy and Richard settle the thorny issue of which company has, above all others, made the greatest number of truly brilliant cars. James has a novel solution for getting caravans to campsites without clogging up the roads, and Jeremy hits the track in a remarkable replica of a legendary rally car. Plus, Radio 2s `Breakfast Show DJ-elect and all round petrolhead Chris Evans is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: In Conversation
programme.desc: Rina Sawayama has been called the future of queer pop music. The Japanese-British singer speaks to the BBCs gender and identity correspondent Megha Mohan about her frustrations with the music industry, how her sexuality informs her art and growing up with racism in the UK. She also reveals, for the first time, the deeply personal and devastating inspiration behind her album.

programme.title: We Built a Zoo
programme.desc: During his teenage years, TikTok star Kyle Thomas built up a small menagerie of exotic animals that lived at home with him and his mother.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: David Harper is on the trail of a remarkable story - the day Buffalo Bill brought his Wild West Show to Wales.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie and Saf clear a bungalow of quirky collectibles, including an Egyptian sarcophagus and a suffragette mannequin. However, they lose track of time during a cuckoo clock fix.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team take on four more precious items, including a remarkable wartime diary from Nazi-occupied Guernsey, a rusted station lamp and a beloved 1980s dolls house.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Day four of the World Athletics Championships gets underway in Japan with the heats of the mens 800m. Olympic champion Emanuel Wanyoni is the one to beat, but Great Britains Max Burgin has had a fantastic season and is aiming for a place on the podium. Meanwhile, Venezuelas defending champion Yulimar Rojas returns to action after 18 months out through injury in triple jump qualifying. Shes a three-time world champion, so could a fourth title be on the cards?

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: The mens and womens 400m reaches the semi-final stage at the World Athletics Championships, and Matthew Hudson-Smith is going for gold. Great Britains world indoor champion Amber Anning is in action as well. Faith Kipyegon broke her own 1500m world record in June, and despite narrowly missing out on becoming the first woman to run a sub-four-minute mile, is the outstanding favourite for gold in Tokyo. And the mens 110m hurdles final finishes the action on day four.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave and Si discover how necessity often forced British cooks to pull out all the stops in an effort to create tasty dishes. In fact some of our favourite meals have been born out of hard times. From tummy fillers like mince and dumplings to hearty Scotch Broths, when the going gets tough we often turn to food for comfort.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for Scotland with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: With over 100 boats in the harbour, Newlyn is Cornwalls biggest fishing port. For generations, young men from here have followed in their fathers footsteps and put to sea. But today, there arent many young locals getting into fishing.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antique experts Caroline Hawley and Nick Hall are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. Caroline is delighted to find a painting by local artist Steven Dews, and Nick is bedazzled by some iconic seventies jewellery. Paul Martin visits the Wilberforce House Museum in Hulls Old Town to hear the amazing story of Hull-born William Wilberforce, the great anti-slave trade campaigner.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, former winners Tim Key, Jamie Laing, Sunetra Sarker and Laura Whitmore take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through the longest undersea tunnel in the world on the Eurotunnel shuttle rail service from Folkestone to Calais.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Go West
programme.desc: The Bikers reach Devon and Dorset for the final leg of their tour. In Dorset, they visit a watercress farm and meet a blacksmith, and in Devon, they search for biltong and learn all about the fermentation and distilling of white rum.

programme.title: Michael Portillos 200 Years of the Rail
programme.sub-title: The Day That Changed the World
programme.desc: Railway enthusiast Michael Portillo leads a landmark journey through 200 years of rail, marking the moment Britains modern railway was born.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Join Maisie Adam, Jo Brand and Lee Mack for a well sick episode of QI.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: The magnificent Jen Brister introduces comedians Esther Manito and Adam Rowe to the stage.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: In Delhi, Rob and Rylan discover a tomb with a view, encounter a billionaire art collector, attempt their own rap performance, and try the ancient art of puppetry.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: A retired widow living in the suburbs is arrested by the British Secret Service for providing classified scientific information, and during interrogation, relives the dramatic events that shaped her life.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: An intimacy crate washes up to help the honeymooners get personal. And when the couples spend the day apart at beach picnics, some are left reeling from shocking revelations, before a brand-new couple jump into stranded life together.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: In 1989, Helen and Dale are forced into direct competition as they fight to become number one. Helen is given her own current affairs program, and Dale becomes the biggest name in news with a Gold Logie nomination.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week continues as the second group of eight hopefuls return to take on the competition. Those who show they mean business will earn the right to work in their first professional kitchen.

programme.title: Go Get Arty

programme.title: Absolute Genius With Dick and Dom
programme.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of food expert Elsie Widdowson, who helped to devise war time rationing. Under her diet, Britain was the healthiest it had ever been. Inspired by Widdowson, Dick and Dom come up with their own genius idea, involving some rations, some army cadets and a gruelling assault course.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: The centre needs to be decorated for a wedding later today, but Dannys more interested in his new invention, which unfortunately blows through every toilet roll in the centre. Fearing Joys reaction, the boys decide to hide the loo rolls.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.sub-title: Nervous Man in a Four-Dollar Room

programme.title: McLintock!

programme.title: Gone to Texas

programme.title: Star Trek

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Members of an elite DEA task force are eliminated one by one following their successful robbery of a powerful drug cartels safe house.

programme.desc: After security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a formidable Latvian prison, Breslins girlfriend is also captured. Now he and his team, must pull off a deadly rescue mission to confront their sadistic foe and save the hostages, hidden in the depths of the prison complex, before time runs out.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, Jacqui Joseph scours Walsall Recycling Centre for quality items. Her mission is to save three things, have them transformed or revitalised and try to sell them for a profit. She has her sights set on a chest of drawers, theres a much-loved set of six dining chairs for upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell to work on, and signwriter Joel Poole works his magic on a mid-century cabinet.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore point their 1960s Rolls Royce north and to the Scottish Borders before heading on to Edinburgh for another auction. Natasha wastes little time when shopping, enchanted by a tobacco barrel manufactured by a quality maker. She also decides to buy a travel case, but only after she discovers the velvet-lined secret compartment it hides within.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: With a swirl of tartan and a burst of the bagpipes, our Scottish tour continues in Fife with antiques experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore. The 1960s Rolls Royce glides the pair through countryside and town as they head from the east coast to central Scotland. Natashas money reserves are dwindling, so she cautiously settles on a bargain piece of Scottish studio pottery. However, a canny buy of an arts and crafts-style lantern pays dividends at the auction in Hamilton.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: We catch up with two families who have been transformed in ways they could never have imagined. When 55-year-old Julie Roberts happily reunited with her birth mother Marion Quigley last year, she unravelled a difficult family history which sparked an extraordinary chain of events. Now Marion wants to track down her two other children who were also taken into care. In our second story, we catch up with 28-year-old Christina Barlow who found her birth mother in Colombia.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Follows three stories of siblings brought together after decades apart. The first story catches up John Nicklin, who spent the first 68 years of his life believing he had no biological family. We tracked him down to Australia and introduced him to four siblings on his birth mothers side. Here, we watch these relationships develop and there is an unusual twist as John goes on to uncover secrets on his fathers side of his family, leading to a whole new reunion.

programme.desc: Bill alienates Sookie, Hoyt remembers the past, and Eric faces a dilemma.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.desc: Sookie and the people of Bon Temps close one chapter while opening several new ones.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Pembleton helps to cover up a scandal involving a congressman in a misguided attempt to please the deputy commissioner.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Russert is thrilled when a former partner is transferred back to the squad. Pembleton makes the hard choice not to implicate his commissioner in the case that cost him his job.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Sansa says too much; Shae asks Tyrion for a favor; Jaime finds a way to pass the time; Arya encounters the Brotherhood Without Banners.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Ciro wants a ceasefire, but it doesnt come without a quid pro quo. Enzo can finally enjoy all hes achieved, but the good times dont last.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: In an unwinnable position, Genny sends Patrizia to agree terms of surrender. He and Ciro go to Enzo and hope he will listen to reason.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Christophers disappointed when he realises being a made man isnt as glorious as he had hoped, and Janice moves into her mothers house.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A troubled mob boss goes into therapy to deal with personal and professional problems.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Tipped off by the Wire, Greggs, Herc, Carver and Freamon hit the projects and intercept a drugs run. No sooner have the cops made a breakthrough than Barksdales crew make a change in their tactics.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: When John Basilone falls for the beautiful Lena, the couple must come to terms with his departure to Iwo Jima.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon is brought before the King Beyond the Wall; Tyrion asks for his reward; Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out; Cersei hosts a dinner for the royal family; Dany sails into Slavers Bay.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Shrapnel
programme.desc: A former Marine and his war buddy face off against the Mexican cartel after his daughter disappears.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Ace assassin Arthur Bishop becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Steve the art of contract killing.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lie behind the front door of the scary house across the street. When the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.desc: When evil spirit Pitch and his army of nightmares come to Earth, the Guardians must protect the children of the world while they sleep. Pitch is powerful, so they need help from a reluctant new team member: the impish spirit of winter, Jack Frost.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Mort discovers he has less than a year to live. After his fiance leaves him, he meets Kate on a dating service that matches people by their death dates, all while being stalked by a crazy pimp.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Drift
programme.desc: Young Liberian refugee Jacqueline barely escapes her war-torn country to settle on a Greek island. Her daily struggle for survival keeps terrible memories at bay, and she becomes close to an American tour guide.

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: A series of episodes set in World War I England reveals the absurdity of war - mankinds most destructive activity.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: She Came to Me
programme.desc: Composer Steven Lauddem is creatively blocked and unable to finish the score for his big comeback opera. At the behest of his wife, Patricia, formerly his therapist, he sets out in search of inspiration and finds much more than he bargained for.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: Sky Original film following Welsh hairdresser Liz Evans fight to save her small towns theatre. Poignant British drama based on a true story starring Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: John Thornton is an Irish-American boxer who, after a professional tragedy, returns to Ireland to retire. There, he meets and falls for the fiery Mary Kate Danaher, much to the disgust of her brother Squire Will Danaher.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna is a little different. She lives in her mothers shed and spends much of her time privately making videos using her thumbs as actors. As her thirtieth birthday approaches, her mum tells her its time to move out.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: An up-and-coming entertainment lawyer Walter Fielding takes the big step with his girlfriend and purchases a fixer-upper for a `steal. As it turns out, the `steal is really a `rip-off and everything that can go wrong, does.

programme.title: Coming 2 America
programme.desc: Needing a male heir to the throne, Prince Akeem returns to Queens, N.Y., to find his long-lost son and bring him back to Zamunda.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teen perpetrates a series of elaborate deceptions to ensure that he and two friends spend a carefree day in Chicago.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: Thrilling prequel chronicling the formative years of Hannibal Lecter, charting his development into a cold-hearted killer against the backdrop of post-war Paris. After the young Hannibal is orphaned during World War II, the beast-in-waiting moves in with his aunt and begins to exhibit a lust for blood as he plans the downfall of the men who killed his sister.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is actually a bloodthirsty vampire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man

At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Eileen
programme.desc: In 1964 Massachusetts, a young secretary becomes enchanted by Rebecca, the glamorous new counsellor at the prison where she works. Their budding friendship soon takes a twisted turn when Rebecca reveals a dark secret.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Eileen
programme.desc: In 1964 Massachusetts, a young secretary becomes enchanted by Rebecca, the glamorous new counsellor at the prison where she works. Their budding friendship soon takes a twisted turn when Rebecca reveals a dark secret.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.desc: Steve Backshall journeys the globe with some of the greatest travellers on the planet as he explores the reasons that drive their epic voyages and the challenges migrating whales face.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. The ice, which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now, is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: The Mekong continues its journey south marking the heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: A baby owl needs to be reunited with its parents and a duck rescue goes wet and wild.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and a look at the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. The Mangrove Family pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix in Zambias Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills theyll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve Backshall journeys the globe with some of the greatest travellers on the planet as he explores the reasons that drive their epic voyages and the challenges migrating whales face.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. The ice, which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now, is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Newport to Clevedon / Yatton / Bristol Channel
programme.desc: Michael discovers the birthplace of British aviation in Bristol and prepares an Airbus 380 for a smooth landing at Filton. In Newport, he uncovers the heroism of a young boy, who rescued a workman from a dock disaster in which many died.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: With purple, green and yellow ribbons flying, and sporting ankle bells, Michael Portillo is led a merry dance in Stogumber, all in the name of fertility. He visits a celebrated Edwardian garden at Hestercombe to discover the fruits of an unusual partnership.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo boldly goes to the moon by way of the Cornish Riviera Express! On the trail of an historic achievement made at the dawn of the Edwardian era, he investigates the first radio signal to be sent across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins in the East Yorkshire port of Hull, where he heads for the docks through which millions of migrants passed at the turn of the 20th century and which are today getting a second wind. At Cottingham, Michael picks up the trail of the future King Edward VII, when he was Prince of Wales. Bertie, as he was known in the family, became embroiled in scandal after a high stakes game of cards in the grand house of Tranby Croft.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a long drive in a 1960s bus that has had a life in the sun, Dave helps a collector trim his fleet of British classics by taking a Triumph TR7 convertible for auction, and Paul is confused by an agricultural Bonser truck.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.sub-title: The First Six Months in Power
programme.desc: Within the first few months in power, Goring eradicated the Nazis parliamentary opposition. These months also saw the rise of Henrich Himmler, the unassuming, uncharismatic head of an elite force of fanatical Nazis known as the SS.

programme.title: Adolf Hitlers War
programme.desc: Hitlers War moves to its endgame as the Soviets cross the German border. With a death toll of over 40 million, a new, scarred Europe will emerge.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Antiques Roadshow makes a return visit to Lowther Castle in Cumbria where they discover an army of Action Man figures, a giant skeleton clock and rarely seen watercolours by Beatrix Potter.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit Kelvingrove Museum and Art Gallery in Glasgow where discoveries include Victorian insect jewellery, a rare silver cup from the time of Cromwell and treasured comics featuring Scotlands beloved rogue `Oor Wullie.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Does one fewer wheel mean cheaper bills? Thats the question the team want to find out this week as they take on a three wheeled wonder - the Reliant Robin.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.sub-title: The First Six Months in Power
programme.desc: Within the first few months in power, Goring eradicated the Nazis parliamentary opposition. These months also saw the rise of Henrich Himmler, the unassuming, uncharismatic head of an elite force of fanatical Nazis known as the SS.

programme.title: Adolf Hitlers War
programme.desc: Hitlers War moves to its endgame as the Soviets cross the German border. With a death toll of over 40 million, a new, scarred Europe will emerge.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Antiques Roadshow makes a return visit to Lowther Castle in Cumbria where they discover an army of Action Man figures, a giant skeleton clock and rarely seen watercolours by Beatrix Potter.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: Simon Reeve continues his epic journey around the world following the Tropic of Cancer. In India, Simons journey takes him from the coast of Gujarat in the west to Kolkata in the east. Along the way he spots the shy and beautiful Indian wild ass, learns of the violence between Hindus and Muslims in Gandhis home city of Ahmedebad and visits the site of one of the worlds worst industrial accidents in Bhopal.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2, but it remains to be seen whether there is any money to be made from this low-spec car.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie head south for an immaculate Lotus Super 7. Derek and Jack are in Sheffield collecting a 1929 Riley Monaco and a 1924 Alvis 12/50 tourer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek picks out a super low mileage MGC and the team pays a little too much to secure it.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds two rare Fiats and a VW Corrado. Meanwhile, Derek has his work cut out in Yorkshire trying to remove an old Morris that appears to be supporting a precarious garage roof.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon recycles some historic oak while Henry comes unstuck when he tries to get to grips with an old Ford Escort.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring a bloody battleground on the Pacific Island of Peleliu and a military fortress in Russia.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: Simon Reeve continues his epic journey around the world following the Tropic of Cancer. In India, Simons journey takes him from the coast of Gujarat in the west to Kolkata in the east. Along the way he spots the shy and beautiful Indian wild ass, learns of the violence between Hindus and Muslims in Gandhis home city of Ahmedebad and visits the site of one of the worlds worst industrial accidents in Bhopal.

programme.title: Vicky Donor
programme.desc: The head of a fertility clinic and sperm bank needs a reliable source of high-quality semen. As luck would have it, he comes into contact with Vicky Arora, an attractive Punjabi whom he convinces to become a donor. When Vicky falls in love and marries a Bengali called Ashima, their relationship takes a turn for the worse when it is discovered that she is infertile.
